All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
This class represents a generic Data Access Object (DAO) which provides basic CRUD operations for accessing and manipulating data stored in a database table.
Bill
Represents a bill in the system.
BillBLL
The BillBLL class provides business logic methods for interacting with Bill objects in the database.
BillDAO
The BillDAO class handles the communication with the database for the Bill model.
BillTableModel
This class represents the table model used to display a list of bills in a JTable.
BillView
This Java class is named BillView, and it's located in the presentation package.
Client
Represents a client in the system.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class provides methods to interact with the ClientDAO class and perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on client data.
ClientController
The ClientController class is responsible for controlling the user interactions with the client management system.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class represents the Data Access Object for the Client entity.
ClientTableModel
This class represents the table model used to display a list of clients in a JTable.
ClientView
The ClientView class represents the GUI for managing client accounts.
ConnectionFactory
This class provides a connection to the database and methods to close the connection, statement, and result set.
EmailValidator
Validates whether an email address is valid according to the specified pattern.
HomePageController
The HomePageController class is responsible for controlling the main page of the application.
HomePageView
Constructs a HomePageView object.
Main
 
Product
Represents a product in the system.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class represents a business logic layer for the Product model.
ProductController
The ProductController class is responsible for controlling the flow of information between the ProductView and the ProductBLL.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class provides methods for interacting with the database table "product".
ProductTableModel
This class represents the table model used to display a list of products in a JTable.
ProductView
The ProductView class represents the GUI for managing products.
Purchase
Represents a purchase in the system.
PurchaseBLL
The PurchaseBLL class represents the business logic layer for the Purchase model.
PurchaseController
The PurchaseController class is responsible for controlling the user interactions with the orders management system.
PurchaseDAO
The PurchaseDAO class provides methods to access and modify the data of Purchase objects in the database.
PurchaseTableModel
This class represents the table model used to display a list of purchases in a JTable.
PurchaseView
This Java code defines a class PurchaseView in the presentation package, which extends the JFrame class.
Validator<T>
Interface for defining a validator that can validate an object of a given type.
